title: Exploring Britain’s cathedrals
itunes:title: Exploring Britain’s cathedrals
itunes:subtitle: Christopher Somerville discusses his experiences of visiting some of Britain’s historic cathedrals
description:
Travel writer Christopher Somerville discusses his experiences of visiting some of Britain’s historic cathedrals and explains what they can tell us about the country’s religious past

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
